purpose.value: This Observation resource represents the Dutch [zib ('Zorginformatiebouwsteen', i.e. Health and Care Information Model) BloodPressure-v3.2.1(2020EN)](https://zibs.nl/wiki/BloodPressure-v3.2.1(2020EN)).
